data.title: That Urge to Squeeze Cute Things Has a Name, It's Called Cute Aggression

data.title: Inside Saudi Arabia’s wild football experiment

So GQ ventured to the kingdom to discover what the gambit represents. Is this the future of the world’s most popular sport? The vanguard of sportswashing? Or something way bigger?
